TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit AesCryptoServiceProvider extends System.Security.Cryptography.Aes

Docs.summary: Performs symmetric encryption and decryption using the Cryptographic Application Programming Interfaces (CAPI) implementation of the Advanced Encryption Standard (AES) algorithm.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example demonstrates how to encrypt and decrypt sample data using the AesCryptoServiceProvider class.
[!code-vb[AesCryptoServProvider#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.security.crypto_74_1.vb)] [!code-cs[AesCryptoServProvider#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.security.crypto_74_1.cs)]

Docs.exception: There is no supported key size for the current platform.

.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.Cryptography.ICryptoTransform CreateDecryptor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Creates a symmetric AES decryptor object using the current key and initialization vector (IV).
Docs.exception: The current key is invalid or missing.

Docs.param: The secret key to use for the symmetric algorithm.
The initialization vector to use for the symmetric algorithm.
Docs.summary: Creates a symmetric AES decryptor object using the specified key and initialization vector (IV).

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example shows how to use the CreateDecryptor method to decrypt an encrypted message. This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AesCryptoServiceProvider> class.
[!code-vb[AesCryptoServProvider#3](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/da7de4f0-05be-4eb7-95ca-_1.vb)] [!code-cs[AesCryptoServProvider#3](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/da7de4f0-05be-4eb7-95ca-_1.cs)]

Docs.summary: Creates a symmetric AES encryptor object using the current key and initialization vector (IV).

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Security.Cryptography.ICryptoTransform CreateEncryptor (byte[] key, byte[] iv);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.Cryptography.ICryptoTransform CreateEncryptor(unsigned int8[] key, unsigned int8[] iv) cil managed

Docs.param: The secret key to use for the symmetric algorithm.
The initialization vector to use for the symmetric algorithm.
Docs.summary: Creates a symmetric encryptor object using the specified key and initialization vector (IV).

remarks.format:
## Remarks See the code examples in the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.LegalKeySizes%2A> and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.LegalBlockSizes%2A> properties to determine the size of the `key` and `iv` parameters.
## Examples The following example shows how to use the CreateEncryptor method to encrypt a message. This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AesCryptoServiceProvider> class.
[!code-vb[AesCryptoServProvider#2](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/2e043d16-7828-4c0a-bf1c-_1.vb)] [!code-cs[AesCryptoServProvider#2](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/2e043d16-7828-4c0a-bf1c-_1.cs)]

Docs.value: The size, in bits, of the key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The minimum size of the key is 128 bits, and the maximum size is 256 bits.
